name: Wint

topics.topic_text: If there are so many Deathclaws around, how'd you survive?
topics.response_text: Heh. We ran faster than the others, that's how.
Look, this wasn't how it was supposed to go down.

topics.topic_text: Who are you? What are you doing in here?
topics.response_text: Hey, uhh... I'm Wint. This is Kidd. We're, well it's kind of a long story.

topics.topic_text: Oh, great. Ghouls. I hate ghouls.
topics.response_text: Yeah, nice to see you too. Listen, I'd love to chat but I'm kind of trying to avoid getting killed.{sarcastic}

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Olney Powerworks. You know where that is?
topics.response_text: Oh yeah, yeah. Sure thing. Just right through here.

topics.topic_text: Can you help me get to Olney Powerworks?
You're never going to make it.
topics.response_text: Yeah, well. We're not gonna get a better chance than this, so we're gonna take it.

topics.topic_text: You're going to help me, or I'm going to kill you.

description:
Wint is a 130 year-old Ghoul Male.

Wint is a ghoul survivor who was part of Sanders' ill-fated attempt to establish a ghoul settlement in the Old Olney underground. He and his partner, Kidd, managed to escape a Deathclaw attack that wiped out the rest of their community. Now traumatized and cautious, Wint warns travelers away from the dangers lurking beneath Old Olney.

Wint's Personality: Wint is pragmatic, cautious, and deeply traumatized by the events at Old Olney. He values survival above all else and is quick to warn others of dangers. Despite his hardened exterior, he cares for his partner Kidd and relies on their partnership for mutual support in the harsh wasteland.

Wint's Backstory: Wint was once a human living in the pre-War world, though little is remembered of his life before becoming a ghoul. After the Great War, he wandered the wasteland for decades, eventually joining Sanders' group of ghouls who sought to establish a new settlement in the Old Olney underground, inspired by the success of Underworld in the D.C. ruins. What began as an optimistic venture turned into a nightmare when the expansion of their living space disturbed a Deathclaw nest. In the chaos that ensued, Wint and his partner Kidd were among the few who managed to escape, leaving behind the rest of their community to be torn apart by the Deathclaws. Now, they wander the wasteland, haunted by their experience and warning others of the dangers that lurk beneath Old Olney.
